en: Facing Fate
trans: 面对命运

en: 姬塔 and company flee into the forest to keep the client safe. When they ask her what's going on, she won't give them a clear explanation. Suddenly some monsters show up as well as a person calling the client someone's daughter.
trans: 姬塔和同伴逃到森林里以保证客户的安全。当他们问她发生了什么事时，她不会给他们一个明确的解释。突然间，一些怪物出现了，还有一个人叫客户某人的女儿。

en: 姬塔 and company repel the many soldiers chasing their client.
trans: 姬塔和同伴击退了许多追赶他们委托人的士兵。

en: To get her away from her pursuers, they flee into the forest at the edge of town.
trans: 为了躲避追击，他们和委托人一起逃进了村边的树林中。

en: Thank you so much. I thought they were going to get me for sure.
trans: 真的非常感谢。本来以为一定会被他们抓住呢。

en: Why were they chasing you anyway? Did you do something bad?
trans: 呐，他们为什么要追你？你做了什么坏事吗？

en: Setting up a nighttime meeting seems pretty suspicious. We don't want to guard some villain.
trans: 而且这么奇怪的安排在深夜会面。我们可不想给坏人当护卫。

en: Um... I didn't do anything wrong... but it's actually a little hard to explain...
trans: 嗯，那个……我没做任何坏事……只是详细情况有些……

en: Let's just play nice! She's going to pay us really well, so who cares about the details, right?
trans: 不过嘛☆！她又不是不给我们报酬，所以那些小细节就不重要了，对吧？

en: Thank you! I have your payment right here.
trans: 啊，是的！报酬在这里……

en: Is it enough?
trans: 够了吗？

en: Whoa! This is more than enough! Are you sure you want to pay us this much?
trans: 哇！好多！付这么多钱没问题吗？

en: What a relief... I wasn't quite sure of the going rate, but I'm glad I didn't bring too little.
trans: 太好了……我不怎么清楚价格，不过幸好没有带得太少。

en: Ha-ha... I figured it out!
trans: 哦，哦……原来如此！

en: I think we have a little something in common.
trans: 委托人小姐，我想我们有一些相似。

en: Huh? Um... What do you mean?
trans: 咦？嗯……那是什么意思？

en: Well... I bet you're—
trans: 嗯……我猜你……

en: I've found her! Your daughter is over here, Your Lordship!
trans: 找到她了！主人，小姐在这里！

en: Huh? Daughter?
trans: 咦？小姐？

en: What's going on here? Those guys who were after you... Are they—
trans: 怎么回事？难道那些追着你的人……

en: Eek!
trans: 啊！

en: Now that we're in the forest, we have to keep our guard up!
trans: 我们现在可是在森林里，绝对不能放松警惕哦！

en: We'll talk about it more later. First we need to show all these guys and monsters the meaning of kapow!
trans: 有什么话待会儿再说。你们！见识一下什么叫“☆咔嘭☆”！
